searcher

Class SimpleSearcherTimer

  • java.lang.Object
    • searcher.Searcher
      • searcher.SimpleSearcher
        • searcher.SimpleSearcherTimer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Timer

    public class SimpleSearcherTimer
extends SimpleSearcher
implements Timer
    A timer implementation for simple searchers that times the findElement method
    Version:
    September 2018
    Author:
    Hugh Osborne

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long getMaximumRuntime()
      Cease timing when the runtime exceeds 5 seconds.
      int getMaximumTaskSize()
      Cease timing when the array size exceeds 10^9
      int getMinimumTaskSize()
      Minimum task size (array size) is set to ten, to avoid indexing errors (index is always five).

      • getMinimumTaskSize

        public int getMinimumTaskSize()
        Minimum task size (array size) is set to ten, to avoid indexing errors (index is always five).
        Specified by:
        getMinimumTaskSize in interface Timer
        Returns:
        minimum task size of ten
